## INTRODUCTION TO STORY  
Powerful communication happens through story. Facts and information, by themselves, can be difficult to digest, remember, or share. If you provide information without story, what you produce may be difficult for the audience to understand and will not impact your audience. Good journalism engages both the heart and mind through good storytelling.
